title: Rendering Engine "Edge Chromium" not working
author: skewty
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
Select `Edge Chromium` renderer and initiate connection and have the page load.

## Current Behavior
Select `Edge Chromium` renderer and initiate connection and page never loads / renders.

## Possible Solution
Fix / finish the feature or provide an error or some sort of display if something went wrong.

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
Create an `Edge Chromium` connection and try to get it to work.

comments.author: sovamind
comments.snippet: Any update on adding the Edge Chromium as a rendering engine for HTTPS natively in mRemoteNG?  We have been using it as an external tool, which works fine, but it'd be nice to have the devices open as tabs natively in the app.  When using Edge as an external tool it always opens tabs in the existing Edge application running outside of mRemoteNG.
